SELECT
FROM client_user e JOIN client_user_login l ON e.id = l.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN client_department d ON e.department_id = d.id LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_code position ON e.position_cd = position.code AND position.client_id = e.client_id AND position.div_cd = 'OR02' LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_code duty ON e.duty_cd = duty.code AND duty.client_id = e.client_id AND duty.div_cd = 'OR01'
